resources.string: There is menu button On Top left corner to open drawer.You can click on picture to see more details. You can slide the card to right side and delete any item
There is back button On Top left corner to go back. You can click on any picture to see more details. These are all your favourites item
There is back button On Top left corner to go back. You can select date and press search button for picture of that day. You can click on picture to see more details
There is back button On Top left corner to go back. You can see details on this screen. you can light on heart sign to add picture in your favourite list
Are You sure you want to exit app?
